cu.explanation_en: Setting global_log_level to an invalid enum value 'invalid_log' will cause logging configuration failure as it is not one of the allowed log levels.

du.explanation_en: Setting global_log_level to an invalid enum value 'invalid_log' will cause logging configuration failure as it is not one of the allowed log levels.
du.explanation_zh: 將 global_log_level 設定為無效的枚舉值 'invalid_log' 會導致日誌配置失敗，因為它不是允許的日誌級別之一。
